name: slashtags-js
description: A practical and gradual exploration of Slashtags protocol design, through a mvp implementation

scripts.lint: npx standard scripts/*.js examples/**/*.js --fix && lerna run lint
scripts.reset: lerna run clean && rimraf packages/*/node_modules node_modules packages/*/package-lock.json
scripts.testnet: pm2 start scripts/setup-testnet.js || echo 'Testnet already running'
scripts.close-testnet: pm2 delete scripts/setup-testnet.js || echo 'Testnet not running'
